question: 祖父母
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>祖父</ja> is grandfather and <ja>祖母</ja> is grandmother. This is both combined. Is it some hybrid grandmapa monster you've created in your lab? Hardly, it just refers to your <vocabulary>grandparents</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>祖父</ja> and <ja>祖母</ja>, which are exceptional readings on their own, so you'll need them in order to be able to read this one too.
